Backslash Muncher ...

Install: Copy the savepool.xml of your choice to 

"Steam Directory\UserData\UserID\202310\local\Ridge Racer Unbounded\Autosave.bin\"

ALI213 release: "Documents\ALI213\202310\Data\Ridge Racer Unbounded\Autosave.bin\"

SKIDROW release: "User Profile\AppData\Local\SKIDROW\202310\Data\Ridge Racer Unbounded\Autosave.bin\"

XP: "User Profile\Local Settings\Application Data\SKIDROW\202310\Data\Ridge Racer Unbounded\Autosave.bin\"

Work for any version/release of the game or only Ali and SKiD?

I love your name lol
Should work for any version/release of the game :D
